    • Method Detail

      • getResourcesForSite

        String getResourcesForSite(String defaultFormat,
                         String sessionId,
                         int siteId,
                         Date fromDate)
        Get all resource tool data for a module (Sakai site) given the sessionId, siteId and the fromDate. If the fromDate is null all resource tool data will be returned
        Parameters:
        defaultFormat - default format
        sessionId - session id
        siteId - site id
        fromDate - filter items changed after this date
        Returns:
        resources string

      • retrieveMoodleFiles

        Collection<MoodleFile> retrieveMoodleFiles(String token,
                                         String component,
                                         String filearea,
                                         int instanceId,
                                         int itemId)
        Retrieves MoodleFiles from Moodle
        Parameters:
        token - Authentication token
        component - component
        filearea - file area
        instanceId - instance id
        itemId - item id
        Returns:
        resources string

      • downloadResource

        byte[] downloadResource(String urlString,
                      String sessionId)

      • getDownloadResourceUrl

        String getDownloadResourceUrl(String urlString,
                            String sessionId)
        Given the raw URL for the resource, add the session information in the required format
        Parameters:
        urlString - base URL String
        sessionId - the session id
        Returns:
        String resource URL with session id
